conbody.p: (a) Prescribes policies and procedures for the acquisition of computer software and computer software documentation, and the rights to use, modify, reproduce, release, perform, display, or disclose such software or documentation. It implements requirements in the following laws and Executive Order:
(1) Computer software or computer software documentation acquired under GSA schedule contracts; or
(2) Releases of computer software or computer software documentation to litigation support contractors (see subpart 204.74).
